website_summaries.verdict: An ultra-durable and affordable 2DS model designed for the youngest of players.
pros: Easily the cheapest modern DS system available
Its sturdy wedge shape is perfect for younger players
Plays every game in the 3DS library
Available in Crimson Red 2 or Electric Blue 2, and includes Mario Kart 7

customer_reviews.title: Better than the old 3DS
customer_reviews.text: We've got the 2DS rapidly and in perfect condition, my 13 years old son wanted a replacement for his broken 3DS and We decided to save some money getting a 2DS instead of the pricey 3DS XL specially because he doesn't use the 3D option at all, he is delighted with the 2DS a great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Pablo

customer_reviews.title: Great Pokemon tool!
customer_reviews.text: Cheap but amazing! You get to play all of nintendos great games without breaking the bank. As a gentleman in his 20's, this can sometimes hurt my hands. I have large hands and it feels as though they get crunched (Lol, great adjective) after 20+minutes. You get what you pay for so it is still great! Thinking about it... This is meant for a child so... Should be a great fit!!:)
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Kunreuther

customer_reviews.title: Grandson is loving this product!
customer_reviews.text: My 12 yr old grand son saved up his money for this awesome product. It arrived in two days and he was so excited. He loves it!!! He and his friends all have one and play games together. So far he has no problems with this device...
customer_reviews.author: Colleen fraser

customer_reviews.title: I love it, so I got the New 2DS XL
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my oldest daughter's birthday. She loves it. Her little sister loves it. I love it, so I got the New 2DS XL. This is a great starter console for young kids. It is durable, has technical applications that test children's ability to take care of a video game console. Most of all... It is cheap! Pick one up for $80 or less with Mario Kart 7 or New Super Mario Brothers 2 pre installed. I plan on getting my youngest daughter the latter, since she likes red, and the newest deal is red and white with New Super Mario Brothers II already installed.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Friend loves it- the most affordable thing Nintendo makes
customer_reviews.text: My friend loves it. He's the sort of person who's always losing things, but whenever he can find both this and its charger, he is very much enjoying the few games he owns for it. And he tells me he likes the huge back catalog to work though. Here's hoping the eShop stays supported for another few years at least- this handheld has had a great run. Both his specific unit, and the 3DS family as a whole. It may not be as good looking or specced-up as the New 2DS or 3DS, but for the same price as those, you get this plus another game or two, and that's what some of us like, apparently.
customer_reviews.author: Jimbob64Top Contributor: Pokémon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing buy!!!! I purchased this as a birthday gift for my son who was turning 5. This game has been dropped on every surface imaginable and still works great! My 12 year old son also enjoys this game a awesome array of games can be downloaded right to the system which makes it perfect for road trips so games aren't being lost in the van seats I recommend this game system for any aged kids its great love everything about it, this is a real hit in my house!! I highly recommend it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chava

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising: Mario Kart 7 is not pre-installed!!!
customer_reviews.text: Product came in excellent condition and seems to be functional as far as I can tell. But I was pretty disappointed that Mario Kart 7 was not included as advertised. I purposely didn’t purchase any additional games because of this, and now I my son is unable to play it until I do. Overall it’s a good product, but I do think the advertisement and packaging needs to be changed since it is false. Based off of other reviews, I am not the only one that experienced this problem, so if you order this, make sure to purchase games as well!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Perfect game for all...plays all the DS games  old and new!!
customer_reviews.text: Made the Christmas great!! after dropping the last unit...this was the most important thing on the list!! Works great as soon as powered up! the skin that we ordered is also a must to have...it changes the boring blue to a great thing to look at! it really improves the look! Plus aids in holding ,keeping a good grip on the game...wonderful!!! not only can you play all your old games on this unityou can aslso buy any new game and play on this unit!! even the newer 3 games! Just not in 3D...not a big deal!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun and cheap
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a fun little electronic it's.not super expensive and you can play all kinds of games.bought one for each of my kids and the love playing them
customer_reviews.author: A.wekly

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!!!
customer_reviews.text: After doing quite a bit of research between the 2DS and the 3DS, we decided to buy our 6 year old twins the 2DS's. It's a great system, is more affordable, and is very durable, which has been proven when it was dropped twice and the only thing that happened was that the game cartridge popped out. The layout is very nice and seems to work well even with smaller hands and fingers. My kids love these things and I'm definitely happy we purchased this system.
customer_reviews.author: modus77

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this 2DS as used and listed in good condition. It came in only 2 days and ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this 2DS as used and listed in good condition. It came in only 2 days and was in perfect condition! Not a single scratch or mark and it worked perfectly. It did not come in the original packaging or have an instruction book, but I did not need those. Excellent job!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly R

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: It is what is advertised, and it works well. I ended up trading it in for credit toward a Nintendo Switch, but that’s more of a me thing. It has more storage for games than you would expect, and it has space for a SD card or micro-SD with adapter. You could drop it a million times and it would probably still hold up by the 1,000,001th drop. But still be careful, because when you drop it, it may think that the game cartridge was ejected and you may lose progress Overall, gr8 product m9 rate 8.75/9
customer_reviews.author: Gavin Starling

customer_reviews.title: Amazing deal. Mario cart is still going down online ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing deal. Mario cart is still going down online and there’s always a game to jump into. You can’t get a better deal than this!
customer_reviews.author: King 75

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specific listing due to it saying “like new” I intended to gift this Nintendo 2ds to my nephew but the box is torn and badly aged. I could have gotten the item from the many other listings that said very good or good and paid much less. I finally gifted this to my nephew, only to find out it doesn’t even charge unless I charge it in a certain angle. EXTREMELY DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.author: hays

customer_reviews.title: more than just a budget 2ds
customer_reviews.text: Very nice i havent had any issues at all. The 2ds was in basicly brann new condition upon arrival. Its works great! Not to mention the main attraction of a 2ds is the better comfort level. I couldn't stand the normal 3ds plus the hinges always break. So this is a great option. If you have the same issue's with the 3ds try this out it's way more than just a budget 3ds. it has it's advantages. So give it a try
customer_reviews.author: snowman

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 1 week of limited use
customer_reviews.text: This broke one week after 1 weeks of use. I purchased this for my 8 year old Autistic daughter so it was pretty disappointing. I'm hoping to be able to work this out with the seller and then will update my review.
customer_reviews.author: AF

customer_reviews.title: Good Product!
customer_reviews.text: The product is actually very nice, much smaller than I have expected. I had a 3ds that got broken by accident and this one is a good replacement because I was playing a 3ds game. The description the company has for the product is very true with the cosmetic scratches and the price is reasonable enough to get it. I do recommend getting this product if you are interested in getting a 2ds, along with the price that will save you a few bucks rather than getting a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: cant go wrong with nintendo!
customer_reviews.text: Saved money buy getting the 2ds and my kids do not even know the difference. It plays 2ds and 3ds games and my kids love it. Well my 8 year old loves it, my 4 year old, not so much. So I would say it is for older kids probably at least 6 and up.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Great Gaming System
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas present for my daughter. She loves it. Durable, easy to hold, has run every game we've tried of DS3 too, which made my daughter very happy. I like that it can't close so the hinges won't break, which has happened with another version of the DS. Graphics are great. Sound quality is good--thank goodness for ear bud connection.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Caroll

customer_reviews.title: Better than 3ds
customer_reviews.text: Better than a 3ds, will last longer thanks to less clunky mechanized pieces and is fun to hold and use
customer_reviews.author: Toby

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This system is exactly what I wanted! It's the perfect size for carrying around and can easily be held one-handed in order to use the stylus. It allows me to play my old DS games and all of the 3DS games I was missing out on, without concerning myself with the 3D display (which I don't get much out of). The layout is excellent and the buttons all click nicely and don't seem gummy. The circlepad is surprisingly useful and usable. Obviously it would be nice if it folded like a DS, but even in the plushy case I bought for it I can still stick it in my pocket and walk around with Streetpass on without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J. Young

customer_reviews.title: Other than that it plays all his games great!
customer_reviews.text: It was a birthday gift for my 4 Yr old. He loves it but shortly after the volume buttons stopped working. The volume is stuck on high so I had to buy him some headphones for when we are in public places. Other than that it plays all his games great!
customer_reviews.author: Teesha

customer_reviews.title: Frozen
customer_reviews.text: My son opened this for Christmas and it is frozen on a start up screen. Took it to game stop and they said there is nothing they can do to fix it. "It's just faulty" To late to return it. So much for buying early.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend, big hit for 6th birthday
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son for his 6th birthday and it was a big hit. The system can fit perfectly in his hands and seems pretty durable (he's already dropped it once). It does have parental controls that works really well, if he goes in something I didn't want him to it sends him back to the home page. I was hesitant at first whether a newly 6 year old would be able to navigate the system, but he did just fine. I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn S

customer_reviews.title: Style and Size are Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my little brother for his birthday and it was a pretty nice purchase. The product itself is great, the size is nice and much more comfortable to hold than my XL 3DS. The style is reminiscent of the original Gameboys and I love that. The only issue I had was it arrived 3 days after it was supposed to, and I had been very stressed those few days because I thought this expensive purchase might have been stolen despite how frequently I checked my mailbox. The price of the product was fair for a new portable gaming device.
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the price. If you want to save money or if you get dizzy playing the 3DS in 3D mode like I do, this product is perfect for you. It's exactly the same as the 3DS, with all the fun and perks minus the 3D gameplay and extra cost. It comes with a user manual, mini games and tons of cool free features, and of course the stylus, which seems to hold up well even with extended use. My only recommendation would be to buy a case and/or cleaning cloth to keep it in good condition - you don't want to damage a catch like this!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Moreland

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on the more expensive less impressive 3DS.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted the 2DS because I feel that the durability is better than that of the 3DS. Having no 3d is not a problem for me as I find it nauseating. While the screen size would be better if it was a little larger it is still an ample size that does not cause me to strain my eyes. Couldn't be happier with the 2DS.
customer_reviews.author: McGlynn

customer_reviews.title: It's nice
customer_reviews.text: It's a really nice device, it does everything the 3ds does except the 3d. It may take a little time getting used to the L and R buttons being at the top of the device but you WILL get the hang of it. It's light, surprisingly portable and overall just neat! Mario Kart 7 is also fun to play.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No hinges to break-great idea
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves this and takes it everywhere. This style of DS doesn’t break like the former kind that has hinges. That’s why we purchased this one-nephew broke the other one swinging the hinges open and closed.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: No DS
customer_reviews.text: Can't use the insurance I bought with it and now in less than a year my son has no DS. There's a reason I added insurance what a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Diesel's Mama

customer_reviews.title: Ruined Christmas (edit)
customer_reviews.text: Edit: turned out to be a region issue. My b. I bought this item in September for my nephew’s Christmas present. He opened it today and it wouldn’t charge or turn on. Due to Amazon’s 30 day return policy, I can’t even return this to get my nephew a working one. He was so excited to play with it and now Christmas is ruined. Thanks guys. 0/5
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Find a different one to purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Recieved the package, the ds doesn't work unless it's plugged in, we checked and it's not a battery issue its the ds itself that is the problem. Also the game that was supposed to be installed on it doesn't even show up. So can't even play it. This was supposed to be a present for my son. I'm waiting for a response back from the seller. And really hoping I'm not out 214$ for the thing.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My son loves that it came with mario cart. He is 5 and its held up to his antics. We also have a 3ds so its nice to be able to buy games and have it work on the 2ds as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Broke istantly
customer_reviews.text: This feel off my son's lap about a two-foot fall, with a case, and broke within a week of purchase. Very let down, Never going to buy refurbished again.
customer_reviews.author: Rory A Murray

customer_reviews.title: Great condition.
customer_reviews.text: Great condition. Came fully charged. Box was questionable which worried me but it didn't effect the system and I was very pleased over all. Now I just need a carrying case for it. It's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Englehart

customer_reviews.title: Love the 2ds
customer_reviews.text: Love the 2ds...my son is 8 and he drops it, steps on it, has spilled a drink on it and it just keeps on working. You can play DS/DSI/3DS games but they DO NOT play in 3d. Which in my experience does not matter at all. (The 3d is more of a novelty to switch on and then right back off on the 3ds. It actually makes game-play very hard and makes a lot of people nauseous.) They are pretty much always on sale for 89.99 or 99.99 so don't pay more than that for a new one. Some of these prices are crazy
customer_reviews.author: LauraMeghan

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Good cheap hand handle console but with o the stupid gimmick of 3D also has built in Mario kart
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Mario Kart 7, described.
customer_reviews.text: States in the product description that it has Mario Kart 7 pre-installed, and it absolutely does NOT. I will have to buy the game for $30 because my son wanted this system purely for that game. The description is VERY misleading!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Smith

customer_reviews.title: it would be nice if it could flip open like the 3ds but ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second 2ds in a little over a year to buy, Don't spill soda on it, it, lol. It works greak, it would be nice if it could flip open like the 3ds but thats just me nitpicking it. other than that I like it it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Staggs

customer_reviews.title: NO MARIO KART
customer_reviews.text: There was no mario kart. Not on the home screen, not in the shop, i was given no code to enter anywhere in/on the box, nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Porter

customer_reviews.title: VERY HAPPY WITH PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: This was a christmas gift i bought for my daughter and she is so happy with it, just for that alone i am giving 5 stars , it came on time and well packaged, fully happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Antfitgodd

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars for actual item - exactly as described and my 6 yr old loves it. 4 stars because when the package arrived the tape along the bottom had been torn from box and flap of box was pushed in. Looks as if someone wanted to see what was in the box... thankfully it arrived
customer_reviews.author: M. Kendall

customer_reviews.title: It is worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I always buy nintendo products for my daughters. Last year I bought 2 2DS for them at Christmas and they were thrill until May of 2014 when one decided to stop work for no reason. It just would not turn on even though it is fully charge, whenever you press the power button the blue light comes on for 5 seconds and then there is a click and the light goes off and that is it. If anyone can help me with this problem I will be grateful.
customer_reviews.author: Beverley C.

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this to anyone
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a Christmas gift for my grandson who was so excited to get it. Now it is only 4 months since he had it and it is broken, there is a wide colorful line across the top screen. I would not recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great buy, delivery, and just what my 9 yr old wanted for his birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect is 3d doesn't matter to you
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these for my fiancé and myself with Pokemon x & y. 3D hurts my eyes so I went with these, I ended up loving them. It fits in my hands perfectly and feels very solid, the battery lasts a while and it doesn't get hot or even warm after hours of use. There's a lot of great games for these and there's no slimming of the hardware it's all exactly like the 3ds rather than the 3d capability and mono speaker. The performance is better without 3d anyways, pick one up it rocks.
customer_reviews.author: Billiam

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I love the 2ds, ive had every single ds so far except for the 3dsXL this one is by far the best. I love the device, but it took 5 days to get here when it was prime, and I am a prime member. not happy at all about how long it took, ontrac sucks at being on time but that doesn't take away from the item its self. totally recommend!
customer_reviews.author: GHAMPTON

customer_reviews.title: They were super excited and lava it works great even though it's ...
customer_reviews.text: Order this is a last minute Christmas gift for the kids and got it on Christmas Eve. They were super excited and lava it works great even though it's used it was purchased through Game Exchange and they're awesome to buy from I bought from their store and Indiana wish there was one here in Michigan.
customer_reviews.author: xy

customer_reviews.title: Scammers beware
customer_reviews.text: It was not the real one. I was scammed and out of 150$
customer_reviews.author: Constance S Wells

customer_reviews.title: My kids are so terribly disappointed. My kids have been waiting for over ...
customer_reviews.text: Would rate a big fat ZERO, if possible. This vendor is a scam. Package never arrived. Tracking number assigned to me from the vendor does not exist and the post office was unable to track my package. My kids are so terribly disappointed. My kids have been waiting for over a month for this. They did not answer our inquiry after Amazon contacted the vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Eva L.

customer_reviews.title: Not in Good Condition
customer_reviews.text: this was marked as being in good condition. The entire back is covered in scratches, the front isnt much better, both screens also have some scratches not a ton but more then a product in "good condition" should have.
customer_reviews.author: BeanBagRunwe

customer_reviews.title: 4/5 stars. Over all a good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Over all, a great product. Touch screen works, volume works, buttons are good, sleep mode works. Comes with a charger. Cheaper than you can buy on at Walmart and they shipped to me rather quickly. It does not come with an SD card, so if you buy one, make sure you buy a card to go with it or you will not be able to play any games.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works great, and it's at a very affordable price point
customer_reviews.text: Brand new, works great, and it's at a very affordable price point. I actually love that it's flat, it kind of reminds me of the old Gamebody colors/Gameboy Avanced. I have big hands, so the 2ds feels much nicer to hold than the 3ds, and it's not heavy and clunky like the 3ds XL. The only downfall was that they waited until the absolute last minute to deliver it (and charge me for it). I ordered it on December 27th, and it didn't arrive until the very last day on the estimated delivery, which was January 9th. Overall, I'm very happy with my purchase though.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew S.

customer_reviews.title: It is a winner!
customer_reviews.text: My grandsons very happy with this and loves the game.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this and I tecommand it for playing games, and I think it's better for playing games than an iPad it's great I use it to play Mario Kart 7 if you need to look up stuff on the internet it comes with an internet browser application
customer_reviews.author: Anazon_user

customer_reviews.title: Wrong DS. BUT IM HAPPY ITS WRONG. LOL
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly. I was sent the wrong DS. But I'm happy. I sent for the regular black blue one and ended up with the second option of Mario kart installed in it. I AM THROUGHLY HAPPY!!!! By all means. This was the best WRONG ITEM confusion I have ever received. THANKS. THE MARIO KART WAS WORTH IT.
customer_reviews.author: Sage

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: What I said about the 2DS Red is what I am gonna say about this one. It plays 3DS games great, The quality varies on DS games. Pictures don't do it justice because it's light weight, easy to handle, and smaller than pictured, Which is a good thing in my opinion. It's a great system to buy if you don't feel like shelling out 200 dollars for a 3DS, which are no where near worth the asking price. I'd highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Haywood

customer_reviews.title: A great alternative to the 3DS
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for Christmas 2013. Though I'm sure it works quite well, she still spends the majority of her gaming time on her 3DS which was bought the Christmas prior. She'll pick this up from time to time so I know it wasn't a total loss or waste of money. If she didn't have the 3DS, I'm sure this would be her "go to" portable console.
customer_reviews.author: Karenann

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful system at a wonderful price
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful system at a wonderful price. So comfortable to play, great design and layout, and a lot more portable than you'd think. It's only slightly bigger than a folded XL. I decided to upgrade to a XL after a few months of having my 2ds, but I'm going to keep both systems since I enjoyed my 2ds so much.
customer_reviews.author: 0xalis

customer_reviews.title: Great price, however the pre-loaded game Mario Kart stopped ...
customer_reviews.text: Great price, however the pre-loaded game Mario Kart stopped working as soon as I linked it to a nintendo account. Still trying to resolve the matter but my kids both wanted one for their birthdays and seem to be very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: myndi

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great value, I gave it to a 8 year old kid. He enjoys it a lot. I dindt like that I couldn`t make a return to change the color of the nintendo, but, except from that everything is fine.
customer_reviews.author: joelposho

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Firstly, I don't understand why it says "w Mario Kart" in the title when it doesn't. Yes it clarifies that it doesn't in the description but it's still somewhat misleading. It came in good condition, however the L button doesn't work well and there's times in which it disconnects from playing with another 2DS. I'm sure this 2DS is the problem because my brothers is brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Max Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our son's 6th birthday. Our kids have several electronics between the two of them, and this is by far his favorite! It's a great deal, especially since it has a game pre-loaded on it!
customer_reviews.author: Kierra  C

customer_reviews.title: A Fun Toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my brother's birthday and he loves it
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Akin

customer_reviews.title: BUYERS BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: This product IS NOT NEW! There are scratches on the screen, obviously pre-owned. The box was in rough shape and had little pieces of ripped wrapping paper taped to the back. Buyers beware.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Happy buyer!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my brother. He must love it as I always see him using it :)
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: I got what I ordered and I'm quite happy, however
customer_reviews.text: I got what I ordered and I'm quite happy, however, I don't know if it's something to do with the model, but OCCASIONALLY load screens may sometimes take a couple of seconds longer than on other devices. To me, that's a minuscule inconvenience that really isn't a big deal to me. Overall, I'm quite happy and excited to play Pokemon Sun and Moon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Best of Mobile
customer_reviews.text: I am a hard core gamer. I love consoles. I just built myself a gaming PC. My 2DS is wonderful. I am able to take part in the great and often spectacular games in the DS library without having to deal with the 3D gimmick. It's fast, I bought an awesome case on Etsy, a super cool decal, and the games are incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working inside 1 week!
customer_reviews.text: It just quit turning on for no discernible reason, even when fully charged, within a week! My son was afraid to tell me because it was a gift and he thought I’d be mad at him. I can’t get through to tech support either. No idea how to return this for a refund. My son is heartbroken!
customer_reviews.author: WickedPixikitten

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap way to play 3DS games, although I only use this as a secondary handheld. The 3ds XL is absolutely worth the extra bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Landon L. Linz

customer_reviews.title: Battery last a long time
customer_reviews.text: This review is late, but thats even better. This 2DS has given my son countless hours of fun. Battery life is unbelievable.
customer_reviews.author: GHall

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to set up for him
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sons birthday. He absolutely loves it. Super easy to set up for him, love that the game is already on there.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: DS Fun Remains Alive and Well
customer_reviews.text: This was a last minute Christmas gift for my 7 year old granddaughter. I had gotten a DS for my grandson some years ago and did not expect these little machines to still be so popular. They have held their value . Wal Mart has the DS bundle for less than what this DS (without the bundle) costs. Nevertheless, it was a hit. These are fun !!
customer_reviews.author: Wandagail

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: My son is really not into this game system. I'm not sure if it's because it's a little outdated or the fact that there aren't too many games for him to play.
customer_reviews.author: LovetoRead Book Reviews

customer_reviews.title: OT in a new light
customer_reviews.text: One of my sons have previously sold his older version of the DS. He was excited he got this one and was able to choose his favorite color. Right now I think it's something good for him to use. He is currently receiving occupational therapy and this helps him out with his fine motor skills.
customer_reviews.author: rockermomliz

customer_reviews.title: I got this for my 27 year old brother for ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 27 year old brother for recovery after surgery and he loves it. He's only used it a few times but it works well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Bought this DS for my brother who is quite entertained ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this DS for my brother who is quite entertained by it. Not much I can say other than it works the way it should.
customer_reviews.author: Damien Coombs

customer_reviews.title: I'm very satisfied with the 2DS and I find that it fits ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to play 3DS games but I didn't want to spend the money on a 3DS, as I would rarely be using the 3D feature - it gives me headaches. I'm very satisfied with the 2DS and I find that it fits quite comfortable in my hand.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Working 2DS
customer_reviews.text: The 2DS arrived and works as advertised. It has an SD card with MarioKart 7 installed, as advertised, as well. I would have given five stars if it had arrived with the stylus.
customer_reviews.author: Saul Tigh

customer_reviews.title: OMG it's so fun.
customer_reviews.text: I have a Nintendo DS but the 3D games won't play on it, and old DS games are getting hard to come by. The reason I chose the 2DS is that it will play both my old games and 3D games, but it cost less that the 3DS AND I don't like 3D effects. Also, I like that it is all in one piece and you don't have to hold it open like the versions that close.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Sheehan

customer_reviews.title: A good and cheap alternative to the 3ds
customer_reviews.text: A great way to play 3ds games if your bugdet is low.
customer_reviews.author: Justin W

customer_reviews.title: Solid product no regret about buying
customer_reviews.text: This system is worth the price it is reliable and has a vast library to keep you entertained. Nintendo supports the 3ds much better than the Wii u so there are always new games and content coming. Most games look better on the 2ds most likely due to the fact that there is no 3d on the 2ds a feature that doesn't bring much in the first place and I have never missed while playing.
customer_reviews.author: Iyanu

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this console. It works with the games for 3DS XL he had before.
customer_reviews.author: happylady

customer_reviews.title: Early for a young child to use.
customer_reviews.text: This DS we bought for my 5 yr old. She plays it all the time. It's easy for her to take the games in and out. It's of great quality and it works just like it did from day one.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Langenfeld

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Sealed brand new, came as described. I will get a 3DS eventually, but this catered to my budget
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: We like it
customer_reviews.text: Kids 9 and 11 were begging for a 3DS but I was too cheap and got this instead. Everyone is happy. They each have their old school DS and take turns playing with this. It plays both regular and 3DS games which is awesome. Probably would not have bought it if that wasn't the case. So now they are able to buy 3DS games or use their friends games.
customer_reviews.author: J2MRIG

customer_reviews.title: Bad expience from this seller.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible state of the product, whit bites and buttons brokes (like the console was used by a very Young chidl) didn't returned the product because returning it cost me 50$ from courrier and the 2ds cost me 70$ dollars, a really bad joke.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: you'll enjoy
customer_reviews.text: Mario kart included? Yes please. Don't think twice, you'll enjoy it
customer_reviews.author: T_Crev

customer_reviews.title: perfect Gift Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This product is great being that it was re-furbished. it still works and charges wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Ellison

customer_reviews.title: Reliving my childhood
customer_reviews.text: I've been super happy with this! Super durable and easy to use. It takes a little bit to get use to where the buttons are positioned but that wasn't a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: AC adapter & AR cards NOT included
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a NEW Crimson Red 2DS last week, and got it today (July 3, 2018), only to be surprised that an AC adapter was NOT included, nor were the AR cards as the product description said there would be. I am pretty disappointed about this, especially since this is the first DS that I have ever bought/owned.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: 2DS is JUST2SWEET.
customer_reviews.text: The 2DS is a great handheld. I highly recommend. The handheld was packaged and shipped nicely. Shipped quick. I was able to open the package and start playing immediately. Mario Kart 7 included on 2DS. Charging is easy. Everything works and if you're in the market for a handheld, I'd pick this up since it's under $100 and has a really large library of games.
customer_reviews.author: Walters Crew

customer_reviews.title: 2DS Red
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my daughter for Christmas and it has been a wonderful form of entertainment and education! Because of how many people who made 2DS purchases around Black Friday/Christmas it took awhile to connect to Nintendo's internet/network to purchase/install games (as I don't think they anticipated the # of users who would connect on Christmas) it was a bummer to have to use our old DS games until their server was up (took a few weeks), but now that it's up it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Had button problems almost right away.
customer_reviews.text: Top right and left buttons have been problematic since it was three weeks old. I would have returned it to Amazon if it wasn't outside the time limit. The unit has randomly frozen up too and have had touchscreen problems. It's not been a good ownership experience.
customer_reviews.author: Smithy

customer_reviews.title: This is a lot of fun, and I immediately took advantage of the Virtual ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a lot of fun, and I immediately took advantage of the Virtual Console to download some nostalgic classics. This is very comfortable for me to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Joel S

customer_reviews.title: Fun gaming
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gaming device and honestly really fun to play with. Both my fiance and I have one, and play games with each other on it. Granted we never have time to really get into something since we're both busy with school, but hey its still fun when we can.
customer_reviews.author: Foxtrot582

customer_reviews.title: A bit topheavy but works fine.
customer_reviews.text: I was worried the shape might be awkward to hold, but the only problem is that the top half is a bit too heavy. Runs all my games just as fast as my 3ds xl though I don't use it as much die to the top heaviness and being unable to angle the screen if I set it on my desk. Good for a secondary ds or for a cheap one but if you can afford a regular one go ahead and get it.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working within a week of getting it which sucked BUT they were super fast in giving me my refund. I will by this again because I do believe it was just bad luck and not a crappy product.
customer_reviews.author: Liz's List

customer_reviews.title: i must say i never had a 3ds but i ...
customer_reviews.text: i must say i never had a 3ds but i bought this for my daughter and i thought it was going to be big and heavy but i was surprised that it was small and light and fits ok in the hands
customer_reviews.author: Deirkson Maduro

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, great price
customer_reviews.text: Essentially the same as the original 3DS, just does not fold shut and does not have the 3D feature (which gave me a headache anyway). Great price, fun for any age. I recommend buying screen protectors and/or a carrying case, since the 2DS cannot fold shut and thus the screens could be susceptible to scratches.
customer_reviews.author: V

product_meta.title: Nintendo 2DS - Electric Blue with Mario Kart 7
feature_bullets: Play all games, both Nintendo DS and Nintendo 3DS, in 2D.
Connect with friends, other players, and wireless hotspots using the wireless StreetPass and SpotPass communication modes to unlock exclusive content for games and download other entertainment.
From games to photos and beyond, Nintendo 2DS is the ultimate 2D gaming experience.
Nintendo 2DS is a 2D system that plays all Nintendo DS and Nintendo 3DS games. Nintendo 2DS is only capable of 2D display. Comes with Pre-Installed Mario Kart 7 game.
"E" Everyone w/Mild Cartoon Violence and Comic Mischief
